property.name: Rules
property.value: While this card is attached, this agent gains +2 to all skills. : React Craft: Afer you win a non-solo op mission: Attach this card to one of your agents at the mission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma 6: In the order of your choosing, target and deactivate all active Firearm and Armor gear. Until the end of the turn, Firearm and Armor gear may only be activated as a Mission Craft action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat 4: Before this agent is retired: Prevent the retirement. Wound this agent, this wound cannot be prevented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat: Target this agent. If this agent is a Medic, you may target an additional agent. Remove on wound from each target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Franchise only. : Intel Craft X: Target an enemy non-leader agent. Until the end of the turn, the target may not perform any action printed on his card. The TN is the target's craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft 7: After an opponent's action activates this card: Discard this card from play. Expose the acting agent and an additional agent. This action may be performed from headquarters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma 7: Before one of your agents activates a gear: Return target gear attached to an opposing agent to its controller's hand. Your gear's expense is reduced by 6 for the purposes of activation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Solo-op - Public - Craft +2 : Charisma actions have -2 TN during this solo op. : React Craft:After you assign a mission team to a mission, discard this card: Permanently increase or decrease both the objective and Victory Points of the missions by 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft 4: After another player declares his attacking mission team: Perform up to three "Recruit an Agent" and/or "Requisition Gear" actions. The attacking team is considered to have the highest craft total for determining who performs the first Mission action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Faceman only. React Charisma: After this agent declares an action: Change the skill used for actions's TN to charisma. The action becomes a charisma action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat 4: After this agent is targeted by a combat action: Cancel the action. The acting player may perform another action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wheelman only. : Mission Transport X: If this is a fight mission, move target agent to headquarters. The TN is the target's transport. : Mission Transport X: If this is a chase mission, wound target opposing agent. the TN is the target's combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Charisma +2 : Combat and transport actions have +1 TN during this solo op. : React Craft: Defore the Debrief Phase: Examine the top two cards of any player's Agency Deck. You may discard this card to discard the exmined cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft X: After an opposing non-leader agent resolves a craft or combat action: Move that agent to headquarters. The TN is the target's craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport X: After an agent is moved from a mission team to headquarters: Target the agent and move him back into the mission team. wound the agent. The TN is the agent's combat plus transport.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft X: After an agent declares an action printed on a gear card: Cancel the action and retire the gear. Fixers may add their charisma to their craft for the purposes of meeting the TN of this action. The TN is the gear's expense.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Faceman or Franchise only. : Mission Charisma 8: Until the end of the turn, your maximum team size and mission team size are increased by 1. Another agent on your mission team may immediately perform an additional Mission action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Solo OP - Public - Craft +2 : Wounds may not be prevented during this solo op. : Mission Craft X: Target an enemy agent that has not performed an action during the mission. Reduce the target's expense to 0. Deactivate all gear attached to the target. the TN is the target's craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Combat React X: After this agent is targeted with a Melee action: Wound the target acting agent. The TN is the target's combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma X: After the end of a mission: Target an enemy agent who was at the mission. Reduce the target's base skills to 0 untill the end of the next mission phase. The TN is the target's expense.

property.value: React Craft: Before this agent discards a card for bravado to meet the TN of an action: Increase that card's bravado by 3.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intrigue - Private - Craft - Bid Value : Attacker: After assigning, bid a value (1-9). The victory points, mission objective, TN, and minimum TN of your actions are equal to your bid. : Defender: After ypu assinging, you may bid a valuse (1-9). If it's higher than the Attacker's bid, attacking agents have no minimum TN, and the victory points, mission objective TN, and the minimum TN for your actions equal your bid.
